main event: An orange glowing ball was seen moving slowly towards the west, stopping, then moving erratically towards the northeast before disappearing.
interesting points: The object appeared to change distance, sometimes seeming far away and other times very close.
The object moved in an erratic pattern, stopping and starting again.
The object was described as an orange glowing ball of light.
The object was observed for an unspecified duration before it went out.
No details are provided about the size, shape, or speed of the object beyond it being a glowing ball.
sighted object: an orange glowing ball of light
